title: Learning Rust with Yew
content:
I set out to build this website as a way to learn Rust as a new language to me. 
 I started off my career coding in Python and then later Java as I have worked on developer productivity with Gradle. 
 Rust has so many interesting use cases on its own but also I find myself drawn to trying to use Rust 
 along with PyO3 and Maturin to make better Python libraries.
author: C. James
